definition: to offer/to present/to dedicate/to donate/to show/to put on display/worthy person (old)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: The team of contributors is generally responsible for the project area and everything in it.
sentences.chinese: 贡献者组成的团队一般负责该项目区域和其中的一切。

sentences.english: Since then, we've had individual contributors provide translations for their own languages.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我们还有个人贡献者提供自己语言的翻译。

sentences.english: Black carbon has newly emerged as the second biggest contributor to climate change.
sentences.chinese: 黑碳最近被认为是造成气候变化的第二大贡献者。

sentences.english: How broadly is this motivation embraced by contributors?
sentences.chinese: 贡献者如何完全地接受了此动机？

sentences.english: For the full list of contributors, see the end of the story.
sentences.chinese: 所有贡献者的列表会在文末给出。

sentences.english: Wikis are web pages that can be edited by multiple contributors.
sentences.chinese: 维基百科是由很多贡献者共同编辑的网页。

sentences.english: Lesser contributions should usually be noted in the acknowledgments section of the manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 相对次要的贡献者可在“致谢”部分列出。

sentences.english: He is now regarded as an independent inventor of and contributor to calculus.
sentences.chinese: 他现在被视为一个独立的发明者和贡献者演算。

sentences.english: However, we are actively looking for contributors to the project.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，我们都在积极地为项目寻找贡献者。

sentences.english: To have a growing community of users and contributors.
sentences.chinese: 我们想要一个不断壮大的用户和贡献者社区。

sentences.english: Germany and Britain are major contributors to the 41 nation coalition on Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 德国和英国是阿富汗41国联军的主要贡献者。

sentences.english: It is one of the largest non-oil contributors to Dubai's economy.
sentences.chinese: 它是迪拜经济最大的非石油贡献者之一。

sentences.english: Contributors have to follow an inbound contribution process.
sentences.chinese: 贡献者需要遵循入站贡献流程。

sentences.english: Programmers and peripheral contributors are not likely to participate equally in major community events.
sentences.chinese: 程序员和外围贡献者不太可能平等参与社区活动。

definition: free software (i.e. software for which sharing, modification etc is permitted)
